name: Dinosauria (ShaneFitzpatrick)
description:
Dinosauria is a 2D action adventure platformer made by me, this project was the first ever gaming project i have ever done so expects some faults here and there. Dinosauria is set in a world where the Dinosaur mafia have taken over your village and moved everyone out to find a new place. As the player you are tasked in finding information on how to defeat this boss and locate him and defeat him.

The process of making this game was quite simple, finding guides on how to do certain scripts helped out a lot including the option to interact with objects. Because of this, i have learnt a lot with how i can start and improve future games i am willing to make when i do  make another 2D game
